Key Match Events: The Blazers got demolished by the injury-riddled Memphis Grizzlies, 134-89.
Pre-Game Insights: The Blazers need to focus on themselves as a team and play their way, be themselves, and stay true to what the coaching staff is trying to pour into them and stay positive.
Post-Match Reflections: The players need to get out of their own heads and put their teammates first.
The team needs to stick together and realize what they're doing wrong and what they need to be better at.
Coach Billups was fired up and mad after the loss and told the team what they needed to hear.
Miscellaneous Highlights: The Blazers will take the floor again for the first leg of a back-to-back against the title-contending Minnesota Timberwolves on Tuesday.
The team had a productive conversation during practice, with several players sharing their thoughts and the coaching staff leading the discussion.
Others: The players are trying to address the issues and hold each other accountable, and they have the confidence to go to each other and address it.
